entry.def: A bluebottle is a large fly with a shiny dark-blue body.

means.word_mean: 1. an annual Eurasian plant cultivated in North America having showy heads of blue or purple or pink or white flowers
2. blowfly with iridescent blue body; makes a loud buzzing noise in flight
